tool_description: This API returns a large collection of kaomojis categorized by emotion.
name: Kaomojis
title: Kaomojis

api_list.name: Get Available Tags
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all of the available tags or emotions available for the kaomoji database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://kaomojis.p.rapidapi.com/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kaomojis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://kaomojis.p.rapidapi.com/tags"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "kaomojis.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Kaomojis
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a full list of kaomojis categorized by emotion.

optional_parameters.name: tag
optional_parameters.description: Add the tag parameter followed by the tag to filter down the list by emotion. You can find available tags by using the /tags endpoint.
